front.title: A Uniform Resource Name (URN) Namespace for the Data Documentation Initiative (DDI)

abstract.t: This document describes the Namespace Identifier (NID) "ddi" for Uniform Resource Names (URNs) used to identify resources that conform to the standards published by the Data Documentation Initiative (DDI) Alliance (https://ddialliance.org/). The DDI Alliance is not affiliated with the Internet Engineering Task Force (IETF) or Internet Society (ISOC); and as an independent submission, it does not have IETF community consensus.
